meta.name: XSOverlay Notifications
meta.description: Display Discord notifications in VR using XSOverlay. Get notified about mentions, DMs, and server messages while you're in VR! Port of Eidenz/XSOverlay-BetterDiscord.

enabled.description: Master toggle for receiving Discord notifications through XSOverlay

enableDMs.description: Show notifications for direct messages and group DMs

enableServers.description: Show notifications for server messages (when mentioned or in allowed channels)
